entries.emrLocation: System Configuration > Interface Engine > Sending Application ID
entries.notes: This is typically configured in the interface engine settings. The value identifies which application is sending the message.

entries.emrLocation: System Configuration > Facility Setup > Facility Identifier
entries.notes: Set in the facility configuration. Usually matches the organization's OID or facility code.
Configured per interface connection. Identifies the target system.

entries.emrLocation: Orders > Order Configuration > Placer Number Generation
entries.notes: Auto-generated by the ordering system. Number format is configurable.

entries.emrLocation: Orders > Order Configuration > Filler Number Assignment
entries.notes: Assigned by the filling system (lab, radiology, etc.). Format varies by department.

entries.emrLocation: Provider Maintenance > Provider Master > Provider Identifiers
entries.notes: Links to provider master file. NPI or internal provider ID is configured here.

entries.emrLocation: System Configuration > Facility Setup > Facility Name
entries.notes: Pulled from facility configuration. Must match payer requirements.
Mapped in the order catalog. The code and description must match the receiving system's compendium.

entries.emrLocation: Provider Maintenance > Provider Master > Provider Identifiers
entries.notes: Same as ORC.12. Should be consistent between ORC and OBR segments.

entries.emrLocation: Patient Registration > MRN Configuration > Identifier Types
entries.notes: MRN format and assigning authority are configured in patient registration settings.

entries.emrLocation: Patient Registration > Account Setup > Account Number Generation
entries.notes: Account number format and generation rules are configured in registration.
